roleset.name: take a picture, create a photograph
roleset.note: PHOTOGRAPH-V NOTES: And don't the Japanese have enough earthquake damage at home? (from photograph.01-v)
PHOTO-N NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01. Comparison to verb entry photograph.01, which maps to VN 25.4. Noun maps to FN Physical_artworks. (from photo.01-n)

example.name: Is this an ethnic slur?
example.text: [Japanese tourists]-1 will be told [*-1]-2 to take care when [*-2] photographing earthquake damage in San Francisco [*T*-4] , the Japan Association of Travel Agents said.

example.name: Very informative LVC usage
example.text: I took a photo of it .
